import inspect


[docs]class Path:

[docs]    def root():
        return(inspect.getfile(Path).split("path.py")[0])


[docs]    def logo():
        return(inspect.getfile(Path).split("path.py")[0] + "files\\logo\\")


[docs]    def binary():
        return(inspect.getfile(Path).split("path.py")[0] + "files\\binary\\")
